attraction.name: Gurudongmar Lake
attraction.description: One of the highest lakes in the world, renowned for its pristine beauty.

attraction.name: Tsomgo Lake
attraction.description: A glacial lake surrounded by snow-capped mountains.

attraction.name: Rumtek Monastery
attraction.description: A spiritual and architectural marvel of Sikkim.

attraction.name: Yuksom
attraction.description: The historical town where the first Chogyal (king) of Sikkim was crowned.

attraction.name: Khangchendzonga National Park
attraction.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, home to diverse flora and fauna and the majestic Khangchendzonga mountain.

attraction.name: Namchi
attraction.description: Known for its grand statues of Lord Shiva and a peaceful retreat in the lap of nature.

attraction.name: Pelling
attraction.description: A popular destination for trekkers, offering views of Khangchendzonga and other Himalayan peaks.

attraction.name: Sevok Monastery
attraction.description: Known for its spiritual significance and tranquil environment.

attraction.name: Singalila National Park
attraction.description: A paradise for trekkers, offering scenic views of the Himalayan range.

attraction.name: Ravangla
attraction.description: A serene town offering breathtaking views of the Kanchenjunga range, popular for trekking and nature walks.

attraction.name: Khecheopalri Lake
attraction.description: A sacred lake revered by Buddhists and Hindus, known for its tranquil surroundings and clear waters.

attraction.name: Rimbi Waterfalls
attraction.description: A beautiful waterfall surrounded by lush greenery, offering a peaceful and scenic view.

attraction.name: Varsey Rhododendron Sanctuary
attraction.description: A natural sanctuary known for its stunning rhododendron forests and panoramic mountain views.

attraction.name: Ganesh Tok
attraction.description: A small temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha, offering panoramic views of Gangtok and the surrounding mountains.

attraction.name: Siddheshwar Dham
attraction.description: A prominent religious site with replicas of the 12 Jyotirlingas and a peaceful ambiance.

attraction.name: Samdruptse
attraction.description: Home to a giant statue of Guru Padmasambhava, revered by Buddhists as a spiritual leader.

attraction.name: Teesta River
attraction.description: Popular for white-water rafting and the picturesque views along its banks.

attraction.name: Bloomfield Falls
attraction.description: A stunning waterfall located in the rugged terrains of West Sikkim, known for its pristine beauty.

attraction.name: Nathula Pass
attraction.description: A high-altitude mountain pass on the Indo-China border, known for its breathtaking views, historical significance, and a popular spot for trekkers and adventure lovers.

attraction.name: Himalayan National Park
attraction.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this park is home to a diverse range of flora and fauna, including rare species like the red panda, snow leopard, and Himalayan tahr.

attraction.name: Baba Mandir
attraction.description: A temple dedicated to Baba Harbhajan Singh, a revered soldier of the Indian Army, believed to be a spiritual figure by locals, located near Nathula Pass.
